textBeforeTable: A sim will get better enjoyment out of reading books that relate to their traits. For example, a Flirty and/or Hopeless Romantic sim will enjoy reading books of the Romance genre more than an Unflirty sim. Sims can read these books for pleasure and enjoyment. General These books can be bought at the book store and/or come as starter books for a bookshelf. Buyable Books Remember when reading time for the sims was that one red generic book in The Sims 1? Well, bookshelves have since evolved from that one defacto book to over a hundred different books in The Sims 3!
